snippet.title: Frozen Ship Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We are excited to introduce our new project. Frozen Ship is a first-person narrative adventure in the unique blending of survival, build&craft, and economic strategy genres.

Welcome to the snow-covered wastelands of a once-thriving world. You will lead an expedition to find a place suitable for establishing a settlement. At your disposal is a crew of 20 people and a ship - a machine capable of covering vast distances while carrying everything necessary for a long journey.

Steam: store.steampowered.com/app/3423990/Frozen_Ship/
Epic Games: store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/frozen-ship-d4d185
